title: MSI's RTX 5060-equipped Cyborg 15 gaming laptop is down to just $899 on Walmart Featuring an Intel Core 7 240H CPU, 16GB of RAM and a 144Hz display
summary: The MSI Cyborg 15 offers powerful gaming performance at a budget-friendly price. Equipped with an Intel Core i7-240H CPU, 16GB of RAM, and a 144Hz display, it's suitable for playing a wide range of games. This gaming laptop provides a balance of performance and affordability.
insight: Budget-friendly gaming performance meets cutting-edge display technology.

title: Save up to $40 on Samsung s 800MB/s P9 Express microSD card this Presidents' Day super-speedy storage for your Nintendo Switch 2
summary: Samsung's P9 Express microSD card offers up to 800MB/s speeds on Amazon for a discounted price, making it a super-speedy storage option for your Nintendo Switch 2.
insight: Faster storage speeds enhance gaming performance on the Nintendo Switch 2.

title: Rufus devs blame Microsoft for blocking latest Windows 11 ISOs, resulting in IP bans Windows Insiders can't download latest Insider ISOs and are met with IP bans
summary: Windows Insiders and Rufus devs face IP bans when trying to download latest Windows 11 ISOs from Microsoft. Users claim Microsoft is blocking their access due to unknown reasons. This issue is affecting the ability of Insiders to download ISOs and use Rufus to create bootable media.
insight: Microsoft's IP blocking hinders Windows Insiders' ISO download experience.

title: SoftBank s $4.2bn OpenAI gain lifts quarterly profits as AI exposure deepens company swings back to profitability in Q3 results
summary: SoftBank reported a net income of Â¥248.6 billion ($1.6 billion) in Q3, swinging back to profitability. This is due in part to a $4.2 billion gain from OpenAI. The company's AI exposure is deepening its profitability.
insight: SoftBank's AI investments fuel profitability growth significantly.

title: This external disc drive can play 4K 3D Blu-rays, along with all your old CDs and DVDs, now for 43% off TROPRO's media player is just $79.99
summary: TROPRO's external disc drive connects via USB 3.0 for fast media access with support for 4K 3D Blu-rays, DVDs, and CDs at 6X, 8X, and 24X speeds respectively.
insight: Access high-quality media on PC without breaking the bank.

title: The Father of Sega Hardware' has passed away, designed all of Sega's consoles Hideki Sato worked his way up from engineer to become Sega s acting president, spending 33 years at the company
summary: Hideki Sato, known as the 'Father of Sega Hardware,' has passed away. He spent 33 years at Sega, rising from engineer to acting president. Sato designed all of Sega's consoles.
insight: Legendary hardware designer leaves lasting impact on gaming industry

title: The future of Quantum computing the tech, companies, and roadmaps that map out a coherent quantum future
summary: Quantum computing is expected to scale exponentially over the next decade, with advancements in qubit technology, trapped ions, and superconducting chips driving breakthroughs in fields like cryptography, optimization, and simulation. Companies like IBM, Google, and Microsoft are racing to develop commercial quantum computers, while startups like Rigetti and IonQ focus on niche applications. A coherent quantum future will require significant advances in error correction, quantum control, and software development.
insight: Quantum computing holds the key to solving intractable problems exponentially faster.

title: Corsair AI Workstation 300 review: Strix Halo sets sail in a compact and classy (but pricey) package
summary: The Corsair AI Workstation 300 delivers compact and classy performance with AMD's Strix Halo platform, offering a wide range of connectivity options. However, a recent price increase and competition from Nvidia GB10 systems make it a less attractive option.
insight: AI workstation performance meets compact design in a pricey package

title: IBM triples entry-level hires for 2026 despite AI adoption, bucking industry trends Chief HR officer says that AI can do most entry-level jobs, but work still requires a human touch
summary: IBM is tripling its entry-level hires despite AI adoption, defying industry trends.
insight: Human skills trump AI in complex, human-centric work environments and tasks.

title: BenQ Mobiuz EX271UZ 27-inch 240 Hz 4K OLED gaming monitor review: BenQ shines with its first gaming OLED monitor
summary: BenQ's Mobiuz EX271UZ is its first OLED gaming monitor, boasting a 27-inch 4K panel and 240 Hz refresh rate.
insight: BenQ enters OLED gaming monitor market with high-performance flagship model

title: LaserPecker LX2 review: Large scale dual laser cutter
summary: The LaserPecker LX2 delivers excellent cutting and engraving capabilities, but struggles with positioning accuracy.
insight: Accurate positioning is crucial for large-scale laser cutting and engraving precision.

title: Turkish wedding party receives Nvidia RTX 5090, RAM necklaces, and Intel CPU for elaborate wedding gifts A Turkish tech delight for the age of PC shortages
summary: A Turkish wedding party receives extravagant PC tech gifts, including Nvidia RTX 5090, RAM necklaces, and Intel CPU. The gifts were given during a time of PC shortages. The bride and groom's reactions showcase their delight.
insight: Tech enthusiasts in Turkey celebrate weddings with luxurious PC hardware gifts.

title: $5,000 RTX 5090 Lightning Z gets killed in extreme overclocking attempt, thermal shock cracks the GPU core MSI's 2,500-Watt XOC BIOS pushed too high a voltage to the core
summary: A $5,000 RTX 5090 suffered thermal shock damage from extreme overclocking, killing the GPU core. The high-voltage XOC BIOS pushed by MSI led to the failure. The card had previously achieved a world record in Geekbench 5 GPU Compute.
insight: Overclocking limits can be fatal, even with high-end, expensive hardware.

title: Western Digital is already sold out of hard drives for all of 2026 chief says some long-term agreements for 2027 and 2028 already in place
summary: Western Digital has sold out of hard drives for 2026 and secured long-term agreements for 2027 and 2028.
insight: Supply chain dominance restricts consumer access to Western Digital products.

title: 60W Pocket Cloud is a microSD card reader with USB PD passthrough for your smartphone (Crowdfunding)
summary: 60W Pocket Cloud is a microSD card reader with 60W USB PD passthrough, allowing for simultaneous charging and storage expansion on Android and iOS devices.
insight: Revives microSD card storage support on modern mobile devices with USB charging.

title: DShanPi-A1 AI Education Rockchip RK3576 SBC features HDMI input and output ports, dual GbE
summary: The DShanPi-A1 AI Education board features a Rockchip RK3576 SoC with 4x Cortex-A72 cores, 4x Cortex-A53 cores, and an Arm Mali-G52 MC3 GPU, paired with up to 8GB RAM and 64GB eMMC flash, supporting HDMI input and output, dual GbE, and AI acceleration.
insight: Powerful AI education tool with rich multimedia and connectivity options.

title: Project Aura A neat, easy-to-assemble, DIY Air quality monitor compatible with Home Assistant
summary: Project Aura is a DIY air quality monitor with a touchscreen display and industrial sensors integrated with Home Assistant, requiring no soldering and easy firmware installation.
insight: Easy, solderless DIY air quality monitoring for smart homes
